title: Albedo to loft Clarity to very low orbit in early 2025
summary: Albedo announced plans June 12 to send its first phone-booth-size satellite into very low Earth orbit early next year.

title: Anduril gets $19 million contract to develop solid rocket motors for U.S. Navy
summary: The company will develop 21-inch diameter solid rocket motors for the second stage of the Standard Missile 6

title: Apex raises $95 million to increase satellite bus production
summary: Satellite manufacturing startup Apex has raised $95 million to allow it to ramp up production of “productized” satellite buses to tap into growing demand, particularly from national security customers.

title: Fifth helium leak detected on Starliner
summary: NASA confirmed that Boeing’s CST-100 Starliner spacecraft has suffered a fifth, although minor, helium leak in its propulsion system as engineers work to prepare the vehicle for its return to Earth next week.

title: FAA Initiates Environmental Review for SpaceX's Starship Operations at KSC
summary: FAA Initiates Environmental Review for SpaceX's Starship Operations at KSC

title: Rocket Lab wins government support to expand solar cell production
summary: Rocket Lab has lined up nearly $50 million in federal and state funding that will help the company expand a New Mexico factory where its produces space-grade solar cells.

title: Pentagon embracing SpaceX’s Starshield for future military satcom
summary: DoD buys Starlink’s commercial internet service but also plans to acquire more than 100 ‘Starshield’ satellites that would be government-owned
